segments.text: You look like a basket case .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My brother in-law just dropped in from the states .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I decided to put him up while he's here , big mistake !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's lazy . I tried being a good host , but if you give him an inch , he'll take a mile .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you think twice next time he comes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So how long has he here for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two weeks . If he thinks I'll put up with his attitude that long he's got another thing coming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I know you do the right thing .
segments.speaker: S1
